中能资本（CNEC）

中能东道（北京）投资管理有限公司（简称中能资本），是一家致力于为企业提供顶层设计与资本运营立体化解决方案的国际领先的全产业链资本运营服务商 。

公司就企业战略定位、商业模式设计、股权经营模式、组织模式、资本模式等内容为中小企业提供咨询服务，规划企业发展思路，助推企业良性发展。公司始终坚持资本运营模式的持续创新，积极与国内外多家银行、信托、基金、券商、保险、期货、律所、会计事务所及境外投资机构进行深度合作。公司倡导“专业决定价值，人品决定未来”的企业文化，聚合全球顶级金融专家、打造专业化运营管理团队，构建多层次、立体化的资本服务平台，秉承发现价值、挖掘价值、实现价值的经营宗旨，为中小企业放大资本价值。

Energy capital (referred to as) is a focus on new energy, new energy vehicles and emerging industry capital investment and financing operation of innovative business services.

Company through the top-level design of enterprise, commercial pattern reconstruction, project financing, equity financing, fund management industry, mergers and acquisitions restructuring and public listing of counseling etc. operation mode, according to new energy power assembly, vehicle production and emerging industries of the capital operation of professional, and give full play to the advantage of the company's professional team, use the capital strength, to the new board, do poineering work board, the main board and the overseas capital market as the goal, preferably in new energy vehicles and new energy industry upstream and downstream industry chain related enterprises for investment and financing cooperation and public listing of counseling, tries their best to build the specialization of the whole industry chain of capital operation service platform.
